title: Eigakan
discription: Netflix-style movie streaming clone using React and Bootstrap for a responsive and user-friendly interface. Integrated Firebase for real-time database management and secure user authentication. Implemented API calls to display dynamic movie data, enhancing the app's functionality and user experience.

title: Website
discription: Created a responsive website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, highlighting the studio's brand identity and ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices.

title: Dice game
discription: Created 'Dice It Right,' a React-based dice game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game features intuitive gameplay with dynamic scoring, utilizing state management in React for handling game logic and tracking player decisions.
